title: Mirror-Mirror
description: When a carpenter in 2008 purchases a antique mirror at auction, he learns that the peculiar facade was designed to conceal a mystical time-travel portal. The extraordinary anomaly enables him to travel seven years into the past, but only as an invisible spirit.To capitalize on the new found capability, Vinni contacts himself in 2001 and shares information from the future to build a phenomenal instantaneous empire, and to experience the joy of falling in love with the same woman twice.But when a nuclear war takes place in 2001, Vinni loses the love of his life and becomes the last man alive on a desolate planet. His younger counterpart is forced to find a way to avert the catastrophe and save mankind from nuclear annihilation.
author: Dave   Lindsay
